name: finnum

stmt.origin: sylbi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))

⊣ (∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0[≅]hs0)→ c0 ∈ dom(card))

stmt.origin: syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, c0))
stmt.pretty: syl2an(hs0 ∈ _om, c0[≅]hs0, c0 ∈ dom(card), hs0 ∈ On, hs0[≅]c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, c0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((hs0 ∈ _om ∧ c0[≅]hs0)→ c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ _om → hs0 ∈ On)
⊣ (c0[≅]hs0 → hs0[≅]c0)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ On ∧ hs0[≅]c0)→ c0 ∈ dom(card))

cumulated.origin:

⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c0 ∈ dom(card))
